column4: im trying to connect to a windows network and samba ( or whatever i use when i open the network folder) says cannot get share list from server
did you try the Connect to Server... option?  that's what I usually use for gui samba
i can't help much, I never had much luck with any samba/cifs GUI programs I just end up putting the mounts in /etc/fstab so it 'just works' and then I forget all about it :)
it's *supposed* to work with hostnames I believe
